channel.title: Charisma - A new adventure! We're back!
channel.description:
[CENTER]
Welcome to Charisma
[IMG]http://w40.imgup.net/ADVER3edd4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img] [B]Download Our Client:[/B] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/snuzx3um9rp0az0/Charisma.jar?dl=0"]Charisma[/URL]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qajsjb.gif[/img] [B]Website:[/B] [URL=http://"http://charismaonline.co.uk/"]Charisma[/URL]
[SPOILER=Details and other images][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o7gaT4O.png[/img]
I'll add a few screenshots and a list below but I hope to see you on and meeting you, Thanks. Features: [B]Perfect[/B] Community [B]Bounty Hunter[/B] [B]Elite Slayer Tasks[/B] [B]Fullscreen[/B] Client! Full [B]working skills[/B] including[B] Hunter[/B], [B]Dungeoneering[/B] and [B]Summoning[/B]! [B]Achievements[/B] and [B]Quests[/B] to do [B]Quick Prayer[/B] Full [B]Godwars[/B] and [B]Nex[/B] Working [B]Vengance[/B] Loads of [B]training spots[/B]. New perfect[B] Hybriding[/B] system. Full functioning [B]Clan Chat[/B] Loads of shops but with a great [B]economy[/B]. [B]10[/B] Bosses [B]Custom[/B] Minigames [B]Professional[/B] Dungeoneering
Elite slayer tasks! Boss pets Rewrote XP modes Flasks and overloads Master capes and veteran capes
[B]Choose from a difficulty:[/B] Easy Medium Hard Legend
[B]Minigames[/B] Assault Fight Caves Pest Control Barrows Duel Arena (Few more Customs ready to be added)
[SPOILER=Screenshots][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3104044/Uten_navn12.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102844/Uten_navn3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102887/Uten_navn10.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102832/Uten_navn.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102856/Uten_navn7.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102851/Uten_navn9.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102890/Uten_navn5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102853/Uten_navn1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102855/Uten_navn4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3103998/Uten_navn11.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3104066/Uten_navn14.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4817996/Charisma_18.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4817999/Charisma_21.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102859/Uten_navn2.png[/img][/SPOILER][/SPOILER]
[LEFT][SIZE=1]Part of the Charisma Online Network[/SIZE] [IMG]http://charismaonline.co.uk/logosmaller.png[/img][/LEFT]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Charisma - A new adventure! We're back!
item.dc:creator: @king_joshied king joshied
item.description:
@king_joshied wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to Charisma

Download Our Client: Charisma

Website: Charisma

[SPOILER=Details and other images]

I’ll add a few screenshots and a list below but I hope to see you on and meeting you, Thanks.
Features:
Perfect Community
Bounty Hunter
Elite Slayer Tasks
Fullscreen Client!
Full working skills including Hunter, Dungeoneering and Summoning!
Achievements and Quests to do
Quick Prayer
Full Godwars and Nex
Working Vengance
Loads of training spots.
New perfect Hybriding system.
Full functioning Clan Chat
Loads of shops but with a great economy.
10 Bosses
Custom Minigames
Professional Dungeoneering

Elite slayer tasks!
Boss pets
Rewrote XP modes
Flasks and overloads
Master capes and veteran capes

Choose from a difficulty:
Easy
Medium
Hard
Legend

Minigames
Assault
Fight Caves
Pest Control
Barrows
Duel Arena
(Few more Customs ready to be added)

[SPOILER=Screenshots]












[/SPOILER][/SPOILER]

[LEFT][SIZE=1]Part of the Charisma Online Network[/SIZE]
[/LEFT]

[/CENTER]
